S. Korean Religious Delegation Leaves

Foreign Delegations Arrive
   Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Turkish Foreign Ministry headed by Ahmet Suha Umar, director general for Bilateral Political Affairs, a delegation of the Albanian Foreign Ministry headed by Fatmir Cela, general director for Bilateral Relations, and a delegation of the Irish Foreign Ministry headed by Isolde Moylan, director for Asia and Pacific Affairs, arrived here on May 8.
